headline: Prediction: 1 Struggling AI Stock to Buy in December Could Make Investors a Fortune in 2025
summary: Applied Materials (NASDAQ: AMAT) is one of the few stocks related to artificial intelligence (AI) that has retreated this year.  The equipment supplier for semiconductor manufacturing facilities is getting hit over fears the U.S. government will bar it from selling products to China, one of its most important markets.  Outside of AI, the wider semiconductor market has gone through a downturn, hurting revenue growth for semiconductor equipment makers.

headline: A New Downcycle Has Started For Applied Materials: Here Is When I'll Start Buying
summary: Investing in Applied Materials (AMAT) after a significant decline for potential high returns during cyclical recoveries.
